Name: Note
Description: You see a small crumbled up note. On it is written "I have hidden a key in the cupboard. Make your way out of here!".

Name: Corkscrew
Description: A one-time use corkscrew for opening bottles.

Name: Wine bottle
Description: A bottle of exquisite wine, unfortunately not to your taste.

Name: Opened wine bottle
Description: An opened bottle of wine. Not to your taste, but could be used to wash something.

Name: Shovel
Description: This is a shovel.

Name: Small key
Description: A small key with ample rust on it. Should still work.

Name: Pickaxe
Description: A sturdy pickaxe looking capable of clearing boulders.

Name: Purple key
Description: A beautiful purple key with a triangle engraving.

Name: Crowbar
Description: A sturdy crowbar, useful for removing planks.

Name: Key fragment
Description: One half of what seems to be a beautiful purple key.

Name: Second key fragment
Description: One half of what seems to be a beautiful purple key.

Name: Fire extinguisher
Description: A small fire extinguisher.

Name: Lump of dirt
Description: A lump of dirt. There seems to be something inside it.

Name: Green key
Description: A green key.

Name: Carving knife
Description: A well-used carving knife perfect for carving wood.

Name: Wood
Description: A lump of malleable wood.

Name: Paint
Description: A bucket of the finest purple paint.

Name: Figurine
Description: A figurine carved in wood resembling a goat.

Name: Painted figurine
Description: A figurine carved in wood resembling a goat that has been dipped in purple paint.

Name: Diary
Description:
A diary with only one readable entry. 
"Today I was reminded of the basket I once had. My father had given me one, with a purple figurine goat and some purple flowers. Unfortunately I lost it, and I have been looking all over for a new one.".

Name: Fire extinguisher tank
Description: The tank for a fire extinguisher.

Name: Handle
Description: A handle for a fire extinguisher.

Name: Basket
Description: A basket useful for carrying things in.

Name: Basket with figurine
Description: A basket with a painted figurine in it.

Name: Flowers
Description: A bouquet of purple flowers.

Name: Basket of gifts
Description: A basket with a bouquet of purple flowers and a painted figurine.
